QUESTION
what is the difference between mani and mazi(define by color too) i heard that mazi is najis but what about mani is this najis too.
ANSWER


Share:
Madhi is that fluid which generally emits when one has an erection and desire. Madhi does not break Ghusl. It only breaks Wudhu.

Mani is that fluid which comes out with force and reduces erection of the private part. Mani necessitates Ghusl.
